name: Envirolight
overview:
Envirolight is a supplier of LED Light Bulbs.

There is a great deal of talk about the savings that can be accrued through using LED bulbs and the benefits are certainly significant. In most cases the initial investment is recovered within the first 12 months. Thereafter you will enjoy savings of up to 90% on electricity costs for the life of the bulb (up to twenty years).

The best way to analyse the savings that can be made is to look at lifetime costs of LED bulbs and compare these to lifetime costs of traditional light bulbs. Take the investment cost for the LED bulb and then add this to the total energy cost of running the bulb throughout its lifetime. This lifetime analysis is necessary because the lifetime of the LED bulb is typically 50,000 hours, which is 50 times longer than the traditional bulb.

The next step is then to appraise the electricity running cost of an equivalent incandescent bulb and then add this to the cost of 50 of these bulbs. As I am sure you will agree this is a truly astonishing saving accrued through the migration to LED bulbs.
